description: RiteKit API is based on REST principles.  Authentication uses standard OAuth 2.0 process  ##Getting started  1. Sign up for [RiteKit](https://ritekit.com/)  1. Go to [developer dashboard](https://ritekit.com/developer/dashboard/)  1. Click "Create a token" button to get your **Client ID** and **Client secret**  1. When you reach your free limit of calls per month, [upgrade to paid tiers](https://ritekit.com/developer/)  ## Options for authorizing API Calls  #### Using Client ID directly  You can directly connect to our API using your **client ID** by sending it as a GET query parameter. This option is simple (no need for oAuth) but it should be used only in case the Client ID is not exposed publicly.
